HomePage.title: See the World Differently
HomePage.subtitle: Handcrafted eyewear that doesn't compromise—premium quality, honest prices, delivered to your door.

Hero.tagline: Your eyes deserve better than generic frames from crowded stores. We craft precision eyewear for people who notice the difference.

StoryHero.description: Experience crystal-clear vision with handcrafted frames designed for people who refuse to compromise on quality or style.

Products.sectionDescription: From morning meetings to late-night reading—glasses that keep up with you, not the other way around.

Bento.sectionDescription: No shortcuts. No compromises. Every frame is engineered for comfort, durability, and crystal-clear vision.
Bento.crystalDescription: Edge-to-edge clarity that makes you forget you're wearing glasses. No blur, no strain, just pure sight.
Bento.impactDescription: Aerospace-grade materials that survive real life.
Bento.deliveryDescription: Free shipping over ৳1500. Track your order from our studio to your hands.

WhyClearr.sectionDescription: We're not another eyewear brand. We're opticians, designers, and perfectionists who got tired of overpriced, underwhelming glasses.
WhyClearr.freeDeliveryDesc: Free delivery on orders over ৳2000. No hidden fees, no surprises at checkout.
WhyClearr.qualityDesc: Premium hinges. Anti-scratch coating. Lenses that stay clear for years.
WhyClearr.returnsDesc: Wrong fit? Changed your mind? Full refund or exchange within 7 days.

QuizCTA.title: Not Sure What Power
QuizCTA.description: Skip the guesswork. Our quick quiz analyzes your reading habits and screen time to recommend the perfect lens strength.

Trust.title: 5,000+ Happy Eyes
Trust.description: We let our customers do the talking. Here's what they think about their new glasses.

FinalCTA.title: Ready to see clearly?
FinalCTA.description: Join thousands who've made the switch. Quality eyewear shouldn't cost a fortune.

Footer.virtualTryOnDesc: Wondering how they'll look? Our AR mirror lets you try on any frame in seconds—no download needed.

About.heroDescription: We believe great eyewear shouldn't require a prescription for your wallet. Advanced lenses, timeless design, fair prices.
About.missionP1: We noticed something strange: people spend 8+ hours a day staring at screens, yet most glasses are designed for a different era. They're either medical-looking or overpriced fashion statements.
About.missionP2: Smart Reading exists to fix that. We make glasses that look good, feel invisible on your face, and actually protect your eyes from the digital world—all without the designer markup.
About.coreValuesDesc: These aren't corporate buzzwords. This is how we make decisions.

Contact.title: Let's Talk
Contact.subtitle: Need help choosing a frame? Questions about your order?
Contact.subtitleLine2: We respond within 2 hours during business days.
Contact.subject: Subject

Shop.title: All Glasses
Shop.description: Find frames that fit your face, your style, and your budget.
Shop.noProductsDesc: We couldn't find anything in this category.

Testimonials.review1: Honestly skeptical about buying glasses online. But these? Perfect fit, premium feel, and half the price of my usual optician. I'm converted.
Testimonials.review2: These don't look like reading glasses—they look like expensive designer frames. Incredibly lightweight too. Best purchase I've made in months.
Testimonials.review3: Used to get splitting headaches after long coding sessions. A week with these blue light glasses and the difference is night and day.

Quiz.subtitle: Three questions. Thirty seconds. The right power for your eyes.

FAQ.description: Quick answers to things people ask us all the time.

VirtualTryOn.title: Virtual Try-On
VirtualTryOn.description: See how any frame looks on your face before you buy. Our AR technology makes it easy to find your perfect match.
VirtualTryOn.comingSoonDesc: Our virtual try-on feature is currently in development. Sign up to be notified when it launches!
VirtualTryOn.featuresDesc: Our upcoming virtual try-on will include these features
VirtualTryOn.feature1Desc: See frames on your face using your phone or webcam
VirtualTryOn.feature2Desc: Accurate color representation so you know exactly what you're getting
VirtualTryOn.feature3Desc: Compare multiple frames side by side to find your favorite

Technology.heroDesc: Every lens we craft combines precision optics with advanced protection. No shortcuts, no compromises.
Technology.sectionDesc: We use only the best materials and coatings to ensure your eyes get the protection they deserve.
Technology.blueLightDesc: Our lenses filter harmful blue light from screens, reducing eye strain and improving sleep quality. Perfect for those long hours in front of computers and phones.
Technology.uvProtectionDesc: Full UV400 protection blocks both UVA and UVB rays, keeping your eyes safe from sun damage even on cloudy days.
Technology.antiGlareDesc: Reduce reflections and glare from screens and overhead lights. See clearly without squinting.
Technology.multiCoatDesc: Seven layers of premium coating for durability, clarity, and protection. Each layer serves a specific purpose.
Technology.digitalDesc: Optimized for modern life. Our lenses are designed specifically for the way we use our eyes today.
Technology.scratchResistDesc: Hard coating protects against daily wear and tear. Your lenses stay clear for years, not months.
Technology.processDesc: Every lens goes through a rigorous quality process
Technology.step1Desc: Precision cut for your exact prescription

FitGuide.heroDesc: The right fit makes all the difference. Learn how to find frames that complement your face shape and feel comfortable all day.
FitGuide.measureDesc: Follow these simple steps to determine your ideal frame size
FitGuide.measureStep1Desc: Measure from the hinge to the tip that goes behind your ear. Standard lengths are 135mm, 140mm, and 145mm.
FitGuide.measureStep2Desc: The bridge sits on your nose. Measure the distance between your eyes at the bridge of your nose.
FitGuide.measureStep3Desc: Measure the widest part of your current lenses. This determines how much of your face the frames will cover.
FitGuide.faceShapeDesc: Different face shapes suit different frame styles. Find yours below.
FitGuide.squareDesc: Strong jawline with equal width and length
FitGuide.roundDesc: Soft curves with similar width and length
FitGuide.ovalDesc: Balanced proportions, slightly wider at cheekbones
FitGuide.ovalRecommend: Try: Most frame shapes work well
FitGuide.ctaDesc: Take our quick quiz to get personalized frame recommendations based on your face shape and style preferences.

Accessories.heroDesc: Everything you need to care for your glasses and keep them looking new.
Accessories.bundleDesc: All our glasses come with a premium case and microfiber cloth. Add the complete care kit to keep your frames pristine.

SmartReadingHero.description: Experience the future of eyewear with our intelligent adaptive lenses. Seamlessly transitions between reading and distance vision, offering unparalleled clarity in every environment.
